autotransform.event package

Submodules

autotransform.event.base module

The Event class represents an event happening in AutoTransform and serves as a base that can be used to provide consistent typing and messaging for similar events.

class autotransform.event.base.Event(data: autotransform.event.base.TData)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.event.base.TData], abc.ABC

The base for Events. Used to construct a loggable event that can be hooked in to through the EventHandler to store logs in custom deployments.

data

The data that represents details of the Event.

Type

TData

create_time

The current timestamp when the event is created.

Type

float

create_time: float
data: autotransform.event.base.TData
static get_color_override() → Optional[str]

Used to override logging color for specific events where needed. Should use colorama ANSI codes.

Returns

An optional color to use to override defaults when logging.

Return type

Optional[str]

abstract static get_logging_level() → autotransform.event.logginglevel.LoggingLevel

The logging level for events of this type.

Returns

The logging detail required to log this event.

Return type

LoggingLevel

get_message() → str

Gets a message that can be output to logs representing the event. Converts type from lowercase with underscores to capitalized words for the message.

Returns

The loggable message.

Return type

str

Used to represent the type of Event, output to logs.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Event.

Return type

autotransform.event.debug module

The DebugEvent is a simple, generic event used for logging debug information to the console. This information is not expected to be logged to long term storage and is used when debugging usage in production environments.

class autotransform.event.debug.DebugEvent(data: autotransform.event.base.TData)

Bases: autotransform.event.base.Event[autotransform.event.debug.DebugEventData]

A simple, generic debugging event used to log debug information to the console.

class autotransform.event.debug.DebugEventData

Bases: TypedDict

The data for a DebugEvent. Contains the information that will be logged when the event is triggered.

autotransform.event.handler module

The EventHandler receives event dispatches and triggers appropriate behavior for the event, such as logging.

class autotransform.event.handler.EventHandler

Bases: object

The handler that all Events are dispatched to that logs these events. Any hooks being added to AutoTransform Events should be added here.

logging_level

The level for which logs will be output to CLI. All other events will be dropped.

Type

LoggingLevel

callbacks

Custom imported callback functions for handling events for custom deployments

Type

List[Callable[[Event], None]]

__instance

The singleton instance of the EventHandler

Type

Optional[EventHandler]

__color_map

A mapping from log level to ANSI color for CLI output

Type

Dict[LoggingLevel, str]

callbacks: List[Callable[[autotransform.event.base.Event], None]]
static get() → autotransform.event.handler.EventHandler

Singleton method for getting the event handler.

Returns

The singleton instance of the EventHandler

Return type

EventHandler

autotransform.event.logginglevel module

The logging level for an Event. Determines how an event is handled, such as if it is written to stdout.

class autotransform.event.logginglevel.LoggingLevel(value)

Bases: int, enum.Enum

The level of an Event, used to determine how it is handled.

DEBUG = 3
ERROR = 0
INFO = 2
WARNING = 1

autotransform.event.run module

The ScriptRunEvent is triggered whenever an AutoTransform script is run and provides information on the run.

class autotransform.event.run.ScriptRunEvent(data: autotransform.event.base.TData)

Bases: autotransform.event.base.Event[autotransform.event.run.ScriptRunEventData]

A ScriptRunEvent is triggered whenever an AutoTransform script is run, either the main script or the regexmod script. Logs details of the run.

static get_logging_level() → autotransform.event.logginglevel.LoggingLevel

Bases: TypedDict

autotransform.event.type module

The Event type enum

class autotransform.event.type.EventType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for Event naming

DEBUG = 'debug'
SCRIPT_RUN = 'script_run'

Module contents

Events are used by AutoTransform for the purposes of logging. The EventHandler can be used as an entry point for hooks in to the Event framework for logging to to an organizations specific dataset. Custom hooks can be added through importing modules using the IMPORTS components setting.
